title: Vipa Car Parts Premium Wiper Blade Set | fits: VAUXHALL CORSA D Hatchback (Jul 2006 to Jun 2015) | All-Weather Performance | Durable, Streak-Free Windshield Wipers | Easy Installation
features: Fits: VAUXHALL CORSA D Hatchback (Jul 2006 to Jun 2015): Specifically designed for seamless compatibility with all VAUXHALL CORSA D Hatchback models from Jul 2006 to Jun 2015, ensuring a precision fit and optimal performance.
High-Quality, All-Weather Performance: Made with premium-grade rubber and advanced aerodynamic design to provide a smooth, streak-free wipe in all weather conditions, including heavy rain and snow
Easy DIY Installation: Designed for effortless attachment, this wiper blade Set features a quick and secure installation process, requiring no special tools or professional assistance.
Durable & Long-Lasting: Engineered with reinforced materials and UV-resistant coating, these wipers ensure extended lifespan and superior resistance against wear and tear.
description: Product Description Previous page Find the Right Fit Search your car’s MAKE, MODEL & YEAR followed by VIPA to find compatible parts fast. Easy to Install Fit your new wipers quickly using our clear instructions and helpful fitting videos. Drive with Clarity Enjoy safer driving with a clear screen and reliable wiping in all conditions. Next page From Fit to Finish—Your Wipers, Done Right 1 FIND 2 FIT 3 DRIVE Clear Vision. Safer Driving. Engineered for Quiet, Streak-Free Performance VIPA Wiper Blades combine aerodynamic design with UV-resistant rubber for whisper-quiet, streak-free wiping. With tool-free installation and all-weather durability, enjoy crystal-clear visibility wherever the road takes you. Built to Endure. Designed to Perform. Advanced Rubber & Rail Construction for Long-Lasting Wiper Performance VIPA Wiper Blades are engineered with precision-cut rubber for streak-free wiping and a reinforced spine for optimal pressure distribution. The dual-material construction resists UV damage, cracking, and wear—ensuring quiet, consistent performance in rain, snow, or grime. From the aerodynamic profile to the quick-fit connector, every element is crafted for reliability, durability, and a crystal-clear driving experience in all conditions. Previous page Full Vehicle Visibility Complete Wiper Sets for Front & Rear Screens Full set for front and rear. Easy install, perfect fit, and clear wiping in any weather. Clear Vision Ahead Reliable Wiper Blades for Front Windscreens Twin-pack wipers built for clarity, fast fitting, and lasting performance in all weather. Clear View Behind Rear Wiper Blades for Reliable Visibility Precision-fit rear wipers for clear vision in all weather—easy to install and built to last. Next page 1 Front & Rear 2 Front 3 Rear Are these wiper blades compatible with my vehicle? These wiper blades are designed with a direct-fit adapter for guaranteed compatibility with supported vehicles. Please check your specific fitment before purchasing. How do I install these wiper blades? Installation is quick and tool-free—simply remove the old wipers and attach the new ones using the pre-fitted adapter. Will these wipers work well in heavy rain and snow? Yes! They are engineered for all-weather performance, ensuring a clear windshield in rain, snow, and extreme conditions. Do these wipers make noise while in use? No! The advanced rubber coating minimizes noise and ensures a smooth, silent wipe. How often should I replace my wiper blades? Wipers should be replaced every 6 to 12 months or when streaking and reduced visibility occur. Are these wipers resistant to cracking and fading? Yes! Made from UV-resistant rubber, they prevent cracking, splitting, and premature wear Can I use these wipers for both front and rear windshields? We offer wiper kits for the front; wiper blade sets for both front and rear, and rear blades for just the rear. Please check the product title and description to ensure you're selecting the right option for your vehicle. Do these wipers leave streaks or smears? No! The precision-cut rubber edge ensures a streak-free, clear windshield for maximum visibility. Will these wipers perform well in extreme temperatures? Yes! They are tested to remain flexible and durable in both freezing cold and extreme heat. How do I determine the correct size for my vehicle? Check your vehicle model in the product title for compatibility. Use the registration finder to confirm fitment, and if you're still unsure, compare the listed wiper sizes with your current wipers.
